name: Maxparts NVH45 15 Degree Coil Roofing Nailer for Wooden House Roof Building 7/8-Inch to 1-3/4-Inch Round Head Coil Nails
short_description: Maxparts NVH45 Roofing Nailer is easy to use, well balance, light weight, it will be your good partner with your building work.
Drives 7/8-Inch to 1-3/4-Inch full head coil roofing nails. High-capacity magazine holds up to 120 coil nails at a time.
Sensitive Trigger Valve, Active Valve, Piston Driver, Cylinder, you can control the speed to shooting the nails by yourseft, but you need to be safe and protect yourself.

Suitable for various materials and applications to meet your different nailing needs. Perfect for applications such as roof ,asphalt and cedar shingles, wooden box assembly, floor underlayment and wall sheathing, siding installation

name: BOSTITCH Coil Roofing Nailer, 1-3/4-Inch to 1-3/4-Inch (RN46)
short_description: The sliding nail gun has lightweight aluminum housing for job site durability
Zero nail lockout feature of the siding nailer eliminates dry firing and indicates when to reload the magazine
Nosepiece of the coil siding nailer features carbide inserts for long-life performance
Aggressive wear guards and skid pads protect the tool from damage on abrasive surfaces
Quick-set adjustable depth guide sets nails to desire depths quickly and conveniently
Patented single-action side load canister for fast, one-step nail loading
Adjustable shingle guide for quick shingle spacing
Over molded grip for comfortable use. Full round driver for more consistent drive quality
product_description: This Coil Roofing Nailer has a durable aluminum housing and a one-door loading system for fast reloading. The roofing nailer has a dry-fire lock out to prevent dry firing and to alert the user to reload the magazine. Depend on this roofing nail gun for durability and comfort.

name: HBT HBCN45P 7/8" to 1-3/4" Coil Roofing Nailer with Magnesium Housing 11 GA Roofing Nail Gun
short_description: Drives 11 gauge full head coil roofing nails ranging from 7/8'' To 1-3/4''
Selective actuation switch allows for either sequential or contact mode
Tool-free adjustable depth control helps set nails properly; adjustable shingle guide allows for quick and consistent shingle spacing
Durable and lightweight magnesium housing helps reduce user fatigue
Skid-resistant pads/wear guards for safety and tool protection; contact safety With Carbide inserts for less wear and tear

name: MPN-R Mini Roofing Palm Nailer
short_description: Ideal for tight spaces on complex roofing projects
Significantly reduces time and hassle of vinyl siding installation
Drives roofing nails of any length with heads up to .49 in.
Metal front exhaust and solid steel sleeve for better durability and driving power
Ultra compact size
product_description: The PneuTools MPN-R Roofing Mini Palm Nailer is a unique mini palm nailer that is designed specifically for roofing nails. Complex roof designs often include several hard to reach areas under overhangs and eves, and the MPN-R allows users to effortlessly drive nails under eves with less than 6 inches of space. In addition, since vinyl siding also requires the use of bulk roofing nails, use the MPN-R to grow a third hand! There’s no need to fumble with siding, nails and a hammer. Simply put a nail in the magnetic tip, find your stud and effortlessly drive the nail to the perfect depth. This nailer makes a great addition to any roofing or siding contractor’s tool collection. Never get stuck in a tight spot without a mini palm nailer again!

name: Freeman PCN450 Pneumatic 15 Degree 1-3/4" Rapid Fire Coil Roofing Nailer
short_description: Construction Applications: Designed for asphalt and cedar shingles, roof and wall sheathing, flooring underlayment, siding installation, crate assembly, and wood fencing
Compatible Nails: 15 degree 11-gauge wire collated coil roofing nails from 3/4" – 1-3/4"
Built to Last: One piece hardened steel drive blade and anodized aluminum cylinder result in a durable pneumatic tool resistant to damage
Contact Actuation Firing: Capable of bump firing for speed or single sequential firing for precision
Fire Lock: Prevents accidental firing for safety when not being used
Tool-Free Depth Adjust: Simply turn the depth adjustment wheel by hand to change the driving depth of nails for various projects and materials
Transparent Bucket: Know at a glance when fasteners run low
Magnetic Nail Holder: Aligns the nails when loading and ensures jam-free firing
Shingle Guide: Positions shingles correct distance from front edge of previous row
Comfort Grip Handle: Reduces fatigue during long shifts and increases accuracy of fastener placement
product_description: The Freeman PCN450 Pneumatic 15 Degree 1-3/4" Rapid Fire Coil Roofing Nailer is perfect for working on asphalt and cedar shingles, roof and wall sheathing, flooring underlayment, siding installation, crate assembly, and wood fencing. This powerful and durable air powered nail gun is built to last and features a bump fire trigger, fire lock, tool-free depth adjust, a transparent bucket, magnetic nail holder, and comfort grip handle. The Pneumatic 15 Degree 1-3/4" Rapid Fire Coil Roofing Nailer will significantly increase the productivity of DIYers tackling home improvement and repair projects as well as construction contractors at the jobsite, and is covered by Freeman's 7 Year Limited Warranty and 90 Day Wearable Parts Warranty.

name: Estwing ECN45 Pneumatic 15 Degree 1-3/4" Coil Roofing Nailer with 1/4" NPT Industrial Swivel Fitting and Bag
short_description: Construction Applications: Pneumatic roofing nail gun designed for asphalt and cedar shingles, roof and wall sheathing, flooring underlayment, siding, shipping crate assembly, and wood fences
Compatible Nails: 15 degree 11-gauge wire collated roofing nails from 3/4" – 1-3/4"
Built to Last: Ultra-durable magnesium body and one piece hardened steel drive blade result in a rugged tool resistant to damage and great for long shifts
Dual Mode Trigger: Fast and easy to switch between single sequential firing for precision or bump firing for speed
Tool-Free Depth Adjust: Simply turn the depth adjustment wheel by hand to change the driving depth of nails for various projects and materials
Transparent Bucket: Know at a glance when fasteners run low
Shingle Guide: Positions shingles correct distance from front edge of previous row
Comfort Grip Handle: Reduces fatigue and increases control for accurate fastener placement
1/4" NPT Swivel Plug: Rotates 360 degrees for maximum accessibility in tight spots
Included: Heavy duty zippered canvas bag with detachable shoulder strap
product_description: The Estwing ECN45 Pneumatic 15 Degree 1-3/4" Coil Roofing Nailer with 1/4" NPT Industrial Swivel Fitting and Bag is the ideal tool for installing asphalt and cedar shingles, roof and wall sheathing, flooring underlayment, siding, shipping crate assembly, and wood fences. This air powered roofing gun is both durable and lightweight, resulting in a rugged tool perfect for extended use. Designed for superior comfort and performance, the nailer features a select fire trigger to easily switch between bump and sequential modes, tool-free depth of drive for easy adjustments, a transparent bucket to see when fasteners run low, a comfort grip handle to reduce fatigue and increase control, and a shingle guide for precise placement of shingles. Suitable for any professional construction contractor at the jobsite or DIYer at home, this roofing nail gun includes a heavy duty zippered canvas bag with detachable shoulder strap and 1/4" NPT swivel plug. The Pneumatic 15 Degree 1-3/4" Coil Roofing Nailer is part of Estwing's professional line of pneumatic tools, and is covered by a 5 Year Professional Tool Warranty and 90 Day Wearable Parts Warranty.

name: Senco 8V0001N 1-3/4" 15 Degree Angle Wire Coil Nailer, Red/Gray - 445Xp
short_description: 360 Degree adjustable exhaust
Drives 11 gauge (.120"), full round head roofing nails 3/4" 1-3/4" smooth shank.
Tool-free adjustable depth of drive for consistent and controllable nail set
Adjustable nail canister accommodates entire range of true round-head roofing nails

name: PneuTools RF45T Coil Roofing Nailer 3/4" - 1 3/4"
short_description: RAPID-FIRE trigger and pneumatic nail feeder increases speed and efficiency
LIGHTWEIGHT and balanced – only 5.5 lbs
QUICK-LOAD traditional side load magazine – capacity up to 120 nails
DEPTH ADJUSTMENT with traditional simple nut and bolt mechanism
CARBIDE nose inserts in steel contact safety for extended life
product_description: The RF45T coil roofing nailer is the perfect combination of speed, balance, and value for the professional roofer. Familiar features like a traditional side-load magazine and a simple bolt depth adjustment make the tool easy to use and prevent frustrating malfunctions on the job. The tool also sports a lightweight aluminum housing, a soft and comfortable rubber grip, and rubber anti-skid plates to ensure it stays secure in your hand and in place when you lay it down on the roof. Quick coupler included – 1/4″ plug with 3/8″NPT threads

name: Metabo HPT 18V MultiVolt Brushless Cordless Coil Roofing Nailer Kit, 1-3/4" Coil Roofing Nailer with Power Tool 2.0Ah Lithium Ion Battery, Drives 7/8" to 1-3/4" Nails, NV1845DA
short_description: FIRST AIR SPRING COIL ROOFING NAILER: Delivers similar performance to a pneumatic tool
NO GAS/NO HOSE/NO COMPRESSOR: For ultimate ease and convenience
EASY FASTENER INSTALLATION: Side loading magazine for quick & convenient nail replenishment
HIGH OUTPUT ENERGY: To drive up to 1-3/4" nails
FASTENERS: Accepts 16º Wire Coil Roofing Nails from 7/8" up to 1-3/4" in length and .120 in diameter
BONUS VINYL SIDING ADAPTER: To install vinyl siding without over driving nails
LONG LASTING: 500 nails per charge using the included compact 18V 2.0Ah battery
DUST & TAR RESISTANT MECHANISM: Prevents debris from entering the driver blade mechanism
DEPTH ADJUSTMENT: Tool-less depth of drive for precision nailing/flush driving
WARRANTY: Lifetime tool body, 2 year battery, 1 year charger
product_description: The Pro Preferred Brand of Pneumatic Nailers introduces a Cordless Coil Roofing Nailer, NV1845DA. This is the first cordless Air Spring Drive coil roofing nailer from Metabo HPT that delivers the performance and convenience professionals demand. Our pneumatic roofing nailer has ruled the jobsite for years and now we are mobile. With the NV1845DA, you can do roof repairs and smaller roofing jobs (like ridge caps, eves, gables) without the hassle of dragging out a hose and compressor just to replace a few shingles. Install vinyl windows with ease or install the included vinyl siding adapter and make a quick depth adjustment to install vinyl siding. The NV1845DA 18V Cordless Coil Roofing Nailer is a part of the expanding MultiVolt System of 18-Volt and 36-Volt power tools from Metabo HPT. GO longer with 18V batteries or GO longer with the unique MultiVolt battery that works on both 18V and 36V tools to double your runtime for up to 8.0Ah of runtime per charge for more power. MAKE. MOVE. GO

SETS NAILS to desire depths quickly and conveniently with quick set adjustable depth guide
DURABILITY AND COMFORT comes with this coil roofing nailer
